arguments.message: **Marketing email** — MELO Labs 20% off promotion for restocked caffeine/melatonin diffusers. No action needed.

content.text: Correction: This is marketing email (20% off promotion from MELO Labs for restocked products), but I've flagged it to Bill for awareness.

arguments.message: ⚠️ Correction: MELO Labs marketing (20% off caffeine/melatonin diffusers). Not urgent, flagged for awareness. Unsub if unwanted.

content.text: Marketing email from MELO Labs offering 20% off restocked caffeine/melatonin diffusers. I initially DM'd Bill with a note, then followed up clarifying it's not urgent and suggesting unsubscribe if unwanted.
